name: Entidad de Gestión de Derechos de los Productores Audiovisuales
legal: Entidad de gestión sin ánimo de lucro
headCity: Ciudad de la Imagen - Pozuelo de Alarcón (MADRID)
goal: EGEDA is a non-profit association that represents and defends the interests of audiovisual producers in Spain and manages their rights as recognised and protected in the Spanish Intellectual Property Act (as amended, dated April 12th 1996). EGEDA has the authority of the Spanish Ministry of Culture for its activities, and operates on a non-profit making basis.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Culture, Development, Enterprise, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Trade
euInitiatives:
Intellectual Property Rights
Cultural diversity
Trade in Audiovisual Services
Copyright
